hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Bomb Bag#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Alcove Above Stairs

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #4# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Hookshot#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Did you know that the Boomerang instantly stuns Phantom Ganon's second form?

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Stone of Agony#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #4# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: I heard @ is pretty good at Zelda.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Mirror Shield# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Stone of Agony#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Serenade of Water#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #2# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of time.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that you can Boomerang items that are freestanding Heart Pieces in the unrandomized game?
